title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 7 Scholar Program is designed to elevate academic rigor and deepen conceptual clarity. Fully aligned with your school’s syllabus, it supports every subject, assignment, test, and project while also building time management, research, and analytical thinking. Students receive structured guidance across all subjects with integrated revision and practice formats.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Mathematics, Science, Social Science, Computer Science, GK, Value Education, and Art.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Covers all class tests, assignments, school projects, and exam readiness
- Weekly concept booster packs, visual charts, and integrated revision planners
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard with goal tracking and behavior notes
- Merit Badges for consistency, creative submissions, and time discipline
- Encourages balance between academic achievement and skill-based excellence

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
In Class 7, CodeVoyagers empowers students to work with structured programming logic, data representation, and future-facing technologies like AI, ML, and introductory web development. Learners begin building their own digital content — from games to basic websites — using interactive tools and guided mini-projects.

This stage turns curiosity into early innovation.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Tools like Scratch, MIT App Inventor, HTML/CSS basics, and AI-based logic puzzles
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault with advanced logic flows and design tasks
- Projects: interactive quiz apps, basic websites, animated stories, and chatbot simulation
- Parent+Child Dashboard showing growth in logic, tech literacy, and project quality
- Builds future-ready digital fluency through AI, ML, and creative computing tools

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 7 program develops structured expression in both speech and writing. Students refine their grammar, explore persuasive writing, and gain confidence in public speaking formats like debates, extempore, and podcasts. Accent clarity, stage practice, and critical listening are key components of the experience.

Optional exposure to global languages like French and German adds a multicultural edge.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Grammar advancement, essay crafting, structured arguments, and journalistic writing
- Activities include podcast-style speaking, panel discussion simulations, and anchoring
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! videos for refining voice modulation and clarity
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other..
- Builds strong academic writing and confident global speakers

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Class 7 MathMagicians focuses on deepening mathematical understanding through logic, proofs, data handling, and multi-step problem-solving. The program supports the full curriculum while encouraging Olympiad readiness, practical application, and real-world integration of math concepts.

Students learn to see math as a toolkit for life, logic, and decision-making.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Topics include rational numbers, algebraic expressions, data handling, and geometry
- Brain Gym with logical reasoning, practical math challenges, and concept drills
- Projects include budgeting, DIY geometry kits, percentage-based planning, and analysis
- Merit Badges for strategy, speed, accuracy, and creative problem-solving
- Builds logical fluency, confidence, and Olympiad-level reasoning ability
